author: undetermined
full_text:
FALSE: A snake didn't slither into Kasarani Stadium, resulting in chaos and leaving several Azimio la Umoja supporters injured

A Facebook post with images purporting to show a snake that slithered into Kasarani stadium causing chaos that left several Azimio la Umoja supporters injured is FALSE.

The claim was also shared on other platforms.

The original post read: "Chaos at Kasarani Stadium after a snake slither its way through VIP Gate B moments after Ra
title: The images used in the claim are old and unrelated to Kenya.
vclaim: A snake allegedly slithered into Kasarani Stadium through VIP Gate B, causing chaos and injuries among Azimio la Umoja supporters.
